content: this is for the mini witch hat pattern this pattern is free on my blog and my youtube channel the finished hat can be used as decor and doll accessories it can also be attached to a headband and worn this is a beginner/intermediate pattern any #4 worsted weight yarn will work in this pattern this is an original design by rachel cantrell rachels lovely stitches you may make and sell items made from this pattern but you are prohibited from copying this pattern and/or selling it as your own please link back to this post if posting your finished items online
